languages.text: {n}Мимолетная улыбка смягчает строгие губы эльдарки. Она молча кивает — ибо родственным душам не нужно слов, чтобы понять чувства и мысли друг друга.{/n}
{n}A fleeting smile softens Yrliet's austere expression. She nods wordlessly, for kindred souls do not need words to understand each other's thoughts and feelings.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мимолетная улыбка смягчает строгие губы эльдарки. Она молча кивает — ибо родственным душам не нужно слов, чтобы понять чувства и мысли друг друга.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ふとした笑顔がユリエットの厳しい表情を和らげた。彼女は言葉もなく頷いた。同胞の魂にはお互いの考えや気持ちを理解するのに言葉は不要なのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fleeting smile softens Yrliet's austere expression. She nods wordlessly, for kindred souls do not need words to understand each other's thoughts and feelings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ふとした笑顔がユリエットの厳しい表情を和らげた。彼女は言葉もなく頷いた。同胞の魂にはお互いの考えや気持ちを理解するのに言葉は不要なのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特严肃的脸上露出了稍纵即逝的微笑。她无言地点点头，因为彼此交融的灵魂不需要言语，就能轻而易举地理解对方的思想与感情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fleeting smile softens Yrliet's austere expression. She nods wordlessly, for kindred souls do not need words to understand each other's thoughts and feelings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特严肃的脸上露出了稍纵即逝的微笑。她无言地点点头，因为彼此交融的灵魂不需要言语，就能轻而易举地理解对方的思想与感情。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un sourire fugace vient adoucir l'expression austère d'Yrliet. Elle acquiesce en silence, car les âmes sœurs n'ont pas besoin de mots pour communiquer leurs pensées et sentiments respectifs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fleeting smile softens Yrliet's austere expression. She nods wordlessly, for kindred souls do not need words to understand each other's thoughts and feelings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sourire fugace vient adoucir l'expression austère d'Yrliet. Elle acquiesce en silence, car les âmes sœurs n'ont pas besoin de mots pour communiquer leurs pensées et sentiments respectifs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una leve sonrisa suaviza el austero rostro de Yrliet. Asiente sin decir nada, ya que las almas gemelas no necesitan palabras para entender los pensamientos y sentimientos del otro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fleeting smile softens Yrliet's austere expression. She nods wordlessly, for kindred souls do not need words to understand each other's thoughts and feelings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una leve sonrisa suaviza el austero rostro de Yrliet. Asiente sin decir nada, ya que las almas gemelas no necesitan palabras para entender los pensamientos y sentimientos del otro.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein flüchtiges Lächeln erhellt Yrliets strengen Ausdruck. Sie nickt wortlos, denn verwandte Seelen brauchen keine Worte, um die Gedanken und Gefühle des anderen zu verstehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fleeting smile softens Yrliet's austere expression. She nods wordlessly, for kindred souls do not need words to understand each other's thoughts and feelings.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein flüchtiges Lächeln erhellt Yrliets strengen Ausdruck. Sie nickt wortlos, denn verwandte Seelen brauchen keine Worte, um die Gedanken und Gefühle des anderen zu verstehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Anlık bir gülümseme, Yrliet'in vakur ifadesini yumuşatıyor. Hiçbir söz söylemeden başını sallıyor. Çünkü aynı kafada olanlar, birbirlerinin düşüncelerini ve hislerini anlamak için kelimelere ihtiyaç duymazlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A fleeting smile softens Yrliet's austere expression. She nods wordlessly, for kindred souls do not need words to understand each other's thoughts and feelings.{/n}
